title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Mix eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture. Stir well.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A fresh salad with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Grill the chicken breast and slice into strips.
Chop the lettuce and add to a bowl.
Toss the salad and top with grilled chicken and Parmesan cheese.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with mixed vegetables and a soy sauce glaze.
instructions: Chop the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a pan and stir-fry the vegetables until tender.
Add soy sauce and stir to coat.
